name: Falling Lights
description:
Falling Lights is a quirky, arcade inspired browser game where you need to dodge sparks falling from the lights above while trying to collect your musical necessities. The goal: beat your high score without setting your caboose on fire (because you only have one).

Just be warned - it may start out easy but the more points you score, the faster the pace of the game gets.

To play the game from the Main Menu:

  • To move the singer you can use the arrow keys or "a" and "d" to move left and right.
  • To score points you need to collect the falling microphones and headsets but be sure to avoid the sparks.
  • If the game ends you can restart or return to main menu.

The game can be paused by pressing escape and can be resumed by either pressing escape again or pressing the "RESUME" button. The main menu can also be accessed from the pause screen by pressing the "MENU" button.

The volume of the music in the game can be changed by pressing the "OPTIONS" button from the main menu and then sliding the volume either up or down on the slider.

Made by Nikita Smal & Anel Basson for BBD Game Jam 2022.
